Vegetation productivity trends.description: Calculate indicators of trends in vegetation productivity.

Integral trends.description: Calculate trend of annually integrated NDVI.

Pixel RESTREND (precipitation).description: Calculate system RESTREND of annually integrated NDVI, after removing trend associated with precipitation.

Pixel RESTREND (soil moisture).description: Calculate pixel RESTREND of annually integrated NDVI, after removing trend associated with soil moisture.

System RESTREND (precipitation).description: Calculate system RESTREND of annually integrated NDVI, after removing trend associated with precipitation.

System RESTREND (soil moisture).description: Calculate system RESTREND of annually integrated NDVI, after removing trend associated with soil moisture.
